use excel recalcualte  so far 24 days gone le  u can calcualte next 1 day how much u take out to make back ur average balance back to the amount u desire. quite simple just average((current balance)*24 + (today's balance))/25= Desired balanceu jus edit ur todays balance until ur desired balance meet wad u wan. todays balance unknown variable  rest all known
